events.name: InventoryAdded
events.description: To track the addition of new items in the inventory.

events.name: InventoryRemoved
events.description: To track the removal of items from inventory.

events.name: InventoryCountUpdated
events.description: To update the stock counts of existing items.

events.name: InventoryChecked
events.description: To check the current status of inventory.

commands.name: AddInventoryItem
commands.description: To track the addition of new items in the inventory.

commands.name: RemoveInventoryItem
commands.description: To track the removal of items from inventory.

commands.name: UpdateInventoryCount
commands.description: To update the stock counts of existing items.

commands.name: CheckInventoryStatus
commands.description: To check the current status of inventory.

integrationPoints.name: OrderManagementIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration with order management to synchronize inventory status.

integrationPoints.name: SupplierManagementIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration with suppliers to automate inventory restocking.

integrationPoints.name: ShippingManagementIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration with shipping to update inventory post shipment.

integrationPoints.name: AccountingIntegration
integrationPoints.description: Integration to reflect inventory changes in financial systems.
